approve(address,uint256).details: prefer ERC20Extended functions to avoid transaction-ordering vulnerability (see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729)

params.amount: quantity of tokens approved for spending

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.amount: quantity by which to decrease allowance

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function will revert)
restriction code (0 if no restriction exists)

params.amount: quantity by which to increase allowance

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function will revert)

messageForTransferRestriction(uint8).details: this implementation reads restriction messages from storage

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: this function may be vulnerable to approval replay attacks

params.owner: holder of tokens and signer of permit

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.holder: holder of tokens prior to transfer

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: return the EIP-712 domain separator unique to contract and chain

allowance(address,address).notice: query the allowance granted from given holder to given spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: grant approval to spender to spend tokens

balanceOf(address).notice: query the token balance of given account

decimals().notice: return token decimals, generally used only for display purposes

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: decrease spend amount granted to spender

detectTransferRestriction(address,addres.notice: return restriction code resulting from given transaction parameters

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: increase spend amount granted to spender

messageForTransferRestriction(uint8).notice: return the appropriate error message for given restriction code

nonces(address).notice: get the current ERC2612 nonce for the given address

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: approve spender to transfer tokens held by owner via signature

totalSupply().notice: query the total minted token supply

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer tokens to given recipient on behalf of given holder

documentation.text: @title SolidState ERC1404 implementation, including recommended ERC20 extensions
